content.rendered:
We spoke to real college students about how Handshake helped them open doors in their careers. Read and follow along in this five-part series.

Meet Arsh, a recent Bucknell University graduate. He used Handshake to find nearby career fairs and job opportunities that were integral to his career growth.

Handshake specifically has helped open doors [through] networking. It was really nice to reach out to them through Handshake. In my junior year, I was talking to this really great company. I even interviewed with them and was able to even connect with one of the alumni from my school that works there.

Arsh

Check out Arsh’s story through his own words below!

One simple action on Handshake could change the course of your career path—be it a 1:1 session with an employer, a job offer, or a new meaningful connection. Open doors in your career now.

excerpt.rendered: Bucknell University graduate, Arsh Noor Amin, shares how Handshake opened doors in his career.
